## Plot

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)

current_time <- now() 
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.5) + labs( title = "Diamond Price vs Carat by Cut", subtitle = paste("Generated on", format(current_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")), x = "Carat", y = "Price (USD)" ) + theme_minimal()

```
